patthana15.16:1.1: Hetuṃ maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
patthana15.16:2.1: Hetuṃ maggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
patthana15.16:3.1: Hetuṃ maggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
